title: num
description: This is a global method that can be used to generate random numbers, since Math.random() is not allowed inside the app script runtime.

methods.name: num
methods.description: Generates a random number between min and max, with optional decimal places.

parameters.name: min
parameters.description: The minimum value of the random number.

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: The maximum value of the random number.

parameters.name: dp
parameters.description: The number of decimal places for the random number. Defaults to 0.

examples.description: Random float between 100 and 1000 with 2 decimal places

snippets.name: Random Integer
snippets.description: Generate a random integer between 0 and 10.

snippets.name: Random Float
snippets.description: Generate a random float between 100 and 1000 with 2 decimal places.
